title: LoL Community I NEED your help! Someone from Riot please look into this.
body:
Guy's I need your help here. I understand that what you are about to here is a very common thing, I am not here to waist your time let alone my own. Please take a few moments to read this and help me get the attention of someone who can genuinely help me.

I was recently ban for use of scripts. Thing is and I know you hear this all the time, I genuinely did not use any scripts in any of my games ever! I got an email saying that a script was detected in my account, and you know what.... I'm sure something was detected, I mean they wouldn't ban me for no reason right? Though I 100% can say I have never used a script EVER!

All I am asking is that someone from Riot really take the time to look into this and look over my games. If anyone looks at any of my game play they will quickly notice that scripts are not there! I play cass and honestly miss about 50% of my Q I can not kite and use E very well I cant CS like a God and I cant auto attack and cast at the same time. I also get hit by almost every skill shot like legit I suck at dodging skill shots. Sure there may be the occasional wow cant believe that happened moment, though they are far out weighed by the omg that was so trash moments.

All I ask is that they can look into my games and find one game where any sort of script was used. I can assure you all that non will be found.

Feel free to check my games on https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=kakoda and you can see I'm not the best player and my stats show it quite clearly. 

Look, I'm not here to stuff around I wouldn't bother wasting mine or anyone else time. Like I understand there "system" detected something what I do not know but 100% I have not scripted or changed anything in the game files.

Again PLEASE, I need your help to get riots attention so someone can look into this matter further and not just leave me in the dark with "well the computer said you did so you did".




---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here are the emails.

**Me**

Hello,

I went to log onto LoL this morning and found I have been perma ban. I have no idea why I have been ban. I have been getting a lot of messages saying I have logged in from a different location though I put that down to using my mobile for internet. It kept telling me my account has been logged in from a different location though most of the time I was on line when it would happen so I am not sure what is happening there.

Would you be able to help me recover my account please?

<---> Ticket Summary <--->
Account Signup Email: not sure
Do you have access to your signup email?: no
Username: 
Summoner Name: Kakoda
Region: oceania
Do you remember the account signup info?: no
Account Creation Date: 
Date of Birth on the account: 
Location where account was registered: 
Please explain how you first gained access to this account: 
Other people who have ever had access to the account: 
Do you remember the store information?: no
What was your first ever RP purchase?: 
What did you use your refund tokens on?: 
Do you remember the first 5 champions you have purchased?: 
First 5 champions you ever purchased: 
First 3150 IP Champion: 
First 4800 IP Champion: 
First 6300 IP Champion: 
Did you receive or give gifts on this account?: 
Gifts Received: 
Gifts Given:

So I was informed that apparently my account was ban due to scripts. hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs. I spoke with someone from another team and they said to recover my account from here. He informed me that it is possible to recover my account though this method. As mentioned previously, I have been constantly getting logged out from LoL saying my account has been logged in from another location. As I said also before I put that down to using my phone as a source of internet.

I have no reason to use scrips, my internet at the moment is way to unstable to play any ranked games I struggle playing normal games. I am now worried that there has been something happening with my account. It could be possible that I got hacked? Could this be the reason to why I kept being logged out?

I have been looking into these bans and stuff and read that some people may have something on there computer that is detected by your anti cheat systems. I figure this would be the case maybe? Please feel free to look though all my games I am sure you will see nothing other then your average player with some awesome plays and some really bad plays that will make you cringe lol!

If this is the case and something on my computer that caused your anti cheat to get a false positive would reformatting my pc be the best option?

Please I have already for the generic response that is sent out to everyone there first few emails. This is a legit claim I don't want to waist time, I know the generic responses so if possible can we please skip that? I compleatly understand there are 1000s of emails coming though claiming i didnt cheat bla bla bla. I am sure 99% of them have. In this case though I can assure you I have not scripted or hacked or used any 3rd party software. Would really appreciate if we can move on to investigation what actually happened so we can resolve this as swiftly as possible

So I was informed that apparently my account was ban due to scripts. hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs. I spoke with someone from another team and they said to recover my account from here. He informed me that it is possible to recover my account though this method. As mentioned previously, I have been constantly getting logged out from LoL saying my account has been logged in from another location. As I said also before I put that down to using my phone as a source of internet.

I have no reason to use scrips, my internet at the moment is way to unstable to play any ranked games I struggle playing normal games. I am now worried that there has been something happening with my account. It could be possible that I got hacked? Could this be the reason to why I kept being logged out?




**Riot**

Greetings,

Thank you for contacting League of Legends Support, Vynix here.

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:
• http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

Vynix
Player Support Specialist

"You can't milk those." - Alistar


**Me**

Like I have said I have already got that reply. I understand this is a process. Though I feel my account was ban unfairly. I have never used hacks cheats or third party programs.

Feel free to go through any and all my games I'm sure you won't find anything out of the odenary.

Seriously, please show me 1 game where a 3rd party program was used? I know 100% I never used anything so I can be sure that not a single game will be found.

Like I have said I have already got that reply. I understand this is a process. Though I feel my account was ban unfairly. I have never used hacks cheats or third party programs.

Feel free to go through any and all my games I'm sure you won't find anything out of the odenary.


**Riot**

Hello Kakoda,

Our system detected the use of scripts within your games. 
I hope you can see why it would be unsatisfying and frustrating to play against other players who are using a tool to tamper with the gameplay experience.

We took action to protect the fairness and integrity of the Fields of Justice.

We have explained the context of your suspension, will not remove or modify it, and consider the matter closed.

Always willing to support, support, support!
-Hueronymous


**Me**

Show me one game where a script was used? I have not scripted. I have also mentioned my account was constantly giving me an error saying it was logged in from another location. 

I kept a close eye on my games and nothing seemed out of the odenary. Please provide me one game where scripts were used. Just one game...

Like I said I have never used scrips all my games are clean. Check the history check every game if you have to from when these so called scripts were detected. 

I can assure you that you will not find a single game where a script was used.

Sure I understand that you say something was detected and again I assure you nothing was used by me. I'm 95% sure my account has not been hacked as I said I kept a close eye on my games since the errors started happening.

I understand you would get a lot of people saying they didn't do it when they did. Though in a very very small amount of cases it can be wrong.

If you are unable to look into these games directly please send this to someone that can help.

As mentioned many times I am sure not a single game had scrips used. Unless you can show me one game just one game this ban is unfair.

I have been on oce.op.gg and my games from the last month are there and all are clean as I know I personally played every single game. Unless you can find a game that scripting was involved this is not fair.

I'm sure your system has found something odd with the account, though it's defiantly not scripting. If only you give me the chance and personally look over these games you will see your your self that there is not scripting in any game played.

I ask senserly please look into this more closely. Instead of just relying on a computer system that can once in a while make mistakes take a moment and look over my games and see for your self this is a mistake.

Hello there,

If you strongly believe that your account was compromised, keep in mind that you are fully responsible for all activity made on your account, and if suspensions or bans are incurred we are not be able to modify them.

If your account has not been compromised, please keep in mind that there are certain third party programs that can run in the background while you are playing League of Legends. These programs are getting caught by the system even if you are not actively taking advantage of it whatsoever.

Such applications should not have had been installed on your machine in the first place, due to being in violation of our Terms.

However, as already mentioned, such things are explained in our Terms of Use and The Summoner's Code which you agreed to every time a new patcher rolled out.

I am disliking to be the bearer of bad news, but your account will not get unbanned.

Kind Regards,

Dalek Skaros
Player Support Specialist
